page.title: 11The Hobbit Play
page.content: Sennen School went to watch the Hobbit Play at the Minack Open Air Theatre. In the morning we went to the workshop to do some games which were like the Hobbit Play.The man said "Pretend you are stuck in a marsh." After we had lunch we went to watch the Hobbit and Jenny took a photo of us.One of the Trolls came up to us and looked in our bags.Then the big dragon came out and there was smoke coming out of his mouth and he looked ferocious and roared at Bilbo and Gandalf .They both ran away then the dragon went back to his cave.Then the dwarves came and sang a jolly song and they ate a meal. Bilbo came back and sat down and smoked his pipe The black birds came to send a mesage to Gandalf that the dragon was dead.We enjoyed our day at the Minack very much.
